name: Elphel/Excelsior Eclipse/VDT/ExDT Plugin
short_description: Plugin Eclipse/VDT supports hardware development in VHDL/Verilog, allowing to easily integrate command-line controlled tools in Eclipse. Underlying Eclipse/ExDT plugin provides integration means that may be used for other languages and applications.
